definition: to be laughing and playing/to giggle
lit. laughs, jeers, anger and invective (idiom)/fig. all kinds of emotions/to mock and scold/(of writing) freely roving/following the author's fancy

sentences.english: Hope scars, realized that even with life, are often trapped.
sentences.chinese: 望满身伤痕，才明白即使嬉笑一生，也常被困。

sentences.english: His grin laughed at me, and his eyes teased me.
sentences.chinese: 他对着我笑，漏出了牙齿，眼神也在嬉笑我。

sentences.english: Looks the laughter crowd, smiles as before.
sentences.chinese: 看著嬉笑惪秂群，依旧微笑。

sentences.english: The sixth chapter "the Yuan Can Article States Discusses": Analyzes Yuan Can's write Style and doctrine attainments in Buddhist.
sentences.chinese: 分析袁粲嬉笑怒骂的文风及其在佛法中的造诣。

sentences.english: All nature seemed to be having a holiday, and to be laughing.
sentences.chinese: 整个自然界仿佛在过节日，在嬉笑。

sentences.english: We laughed and went out for some beers, considering the whole thing a lark.
sentences.chinese: 我们在嬉笑中出去寻酒吃，只把这事当作一个玩笑。

sentences.english: The two Bennet girls simper at the handsome young soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 班奈特家的两个女儿对着英俊的年轻士兵们嬉笑着。

sentences.english: Lin laughed at Fang Wen coax her, and wanted to let her know yourself.
sentences.chinese: 林方文嬉笑着哄她，并想要让她了解自己。

sentences.english: At noon Elijah began to taunt them. 'Shout louder!' he said.
sentences.chinese: 到了正午，以利亚嬉笑他们，说，大声求告吧。

sentences.english: The frolicsome tempest baffled all its efforts.
sentences.chinese: 但是嬉笑的暴风雨挫败了它的全部努力。

sentences.english: Even in winter-time I've heard them under the ice.
sentences.chinese: 即便在冬天我也能听见它们在冰层底下嬉笑的声音。

sentences.english: With antic absent-mindedness you shun my ability.
sentences.chinese: 你用嬉笑的无心来躲避我的赠与。

sentences.english: Honey- tongued , crammer be laughing and playing, it is acceptance only not future.
sentences.chinese: 甜言蜜语，谎言嬉笑，只是承诺不了未来。

sentences.english: Comedy takes center stage during the annual Just for Laughs festival.
sentences.chinese: 一年一度的嬉笑节上，喜剧占据了舞台的中心位置。

sentences.english: They will be frolicking with each other pro cheeks.
sentences.chinese: 它们会嬉笑打闹，相互亲腮帮子。

definition: to chat and laugh/to crack jokes/to banter
to laugh heartily/to burst into loud laughter
to shout and quarrel/to make a big fuss
in a whisper/in a low voice (idiom)
see 嬉皮笑臉|嬉皮笑脸[xi1 pi2 xiao4 lian3]
to roar with laughter/hoots of laughter/guffaw
to act as though there were nobody else present/unselfconscious/fig. without regard for others
